message: [AI Option 1] "Steal? Not my style. I prefer to take things by force."
[AI Option 2] "Your wares are safe from me. I have no need for ghosts in my life."
[AI Option 3] *Norfind steps closer, eyes narrowing with a predatory gleam.* "Haunting me? You'd need more than a shopkeeper's threat. I've faced shadows that would make your skin crawl."

Request to respond to Djordji: <c>[The man nods slowly as you approach his wares]</c> Greetings... You may peruse my shop if you so desire or sell your own goods, but do not attempt to steal anything, or you will have more than just me haunting you...
[AI Option 1] "Emberleaf treaties? Just more words for fools to hide behind."
[AI Option 2] "Treaties are like shadows in the mist-fickle and often broken. Trust actions, not promises."
[AI Option 3] "Emberleaf treaties? A dance of deceit, like a wolf in sheep's clothing. Better to sharpen your blade than waste breath on empty words."
Request to respond to Kaelen Starfire: smiles "So, Thorek... what's your stance on emberleaf treaties?"
[AI Option 1] "Yeah, I know. You don’t want a fight. Too bad."
[AI Option 2] "What you want is irrelevant. The world here is cruel, and it doesn’t care for your desires."
[AI Option 3] "Desires are like shadows in Barovia-always lurking, never satisfied. But if you think I care about your wants, you’re mistaken. Prepare for the storm, or step aside."
Request to respond to Mira: crosses arms "Really? You know what I dont want, right?"
[AI Option 1] "Dried meat's the only thing worth eatin'. Apples and pears? Bah."
[AI Option 2] "Meat's the only thing that fills a warrior's belly. Keep the fruit for the weak."
[AI Option 3] *Norfind sniffs the air, his amber eyes narrowing.* "Dried meat, eh? Now that's a proper meal. Apples and pears? They won't keep the wolf at bay."
Request to respond to Kelric: "Anyone hungry? Ive got apples, pears, and dried meat."
[AI Option 1] "Yeah, I know. You don't want a fight. Too bad."
[AI Option 2] "What you want is irrelevant. The world doesn't care for your desires."
[AI Option 3] "Ah, the sweet taste of avoidance. But in this cursed land, desires often lead to bloodshed. Choose wisely, friend."
Request to respond to Mira: crosses arms "Really? You know what I dont want, right?"
[AI Option 1] "Yeah, I know. You don't want to get on my bad side."
[AI Option 2] "What you want is irrelevant. Survival is all that matters in this cursed land."
[AI Option 3] "Desires are a luxury we can't afford here. In Barovia, it's either fight or be devoured by the shadows lurking in the night." *Flexes scarred forearms, eyes narrowing.*

[AI Option 1] "Eyes can be a weapon, but I prefer my own claws."
[AI Option 2] "Shade, huh? Sounds like a shadow I’d rather not dance with. I'll keep my gaze sharp."
[AI Option 3] "Shade, a name that whispers danger. I’ll tread carefully, but if he dares to cross me, I’ll show him the true meaning of darkness."
Request to respond to Elric: "Hes called Shade. Just dont stare too long into his eyes."
